text: The Volkswagen Golf Mk1 is the first generation of the compact car Volkswagen Golf. It was made from from 1974 to 1983. == Models == From 1982 to 1984, Volkswagen made a sports model called the Golf GTD. From 1976 to 1983, Volkswagen made a sports model called the Golf GTI. From 1979 to 1983, Volkswagen made a convertible model called the Golf Cabriolet. From 1979 to 1984,Werner Oswald: Deutsche Autos 1945–1990, vol. 3. Motorbuch Verlag Stuttgart 2001. , p. 72-87.Mike Covello: Standard Catalog of Imported Cars 1946–2002. Krause Publications, Iola 2002. , p. 826-829. Volkswagen made a sedan model called the Volkswagen Jetta. In North America, Volkswagen made the Rabbit, it was made from 1978 to 1984. In North America, Volkswagen made a pickup truck called the Rabbit Pickup, It was made from 1978 to 1984. In Europe, It was called the Volkswagen Caddy and was made from 1982 to 1992. In Mexico, Volkswagen made the Caribe, and sports model; Caribe Pro, it was made from 1977 to 1987.
